name: 陳志恆
objective:
本課程將從有機化學的基本觀念探討各種有機物質的性質，以及其在材料及資源工程領域之應用。
The course will cover the special topic of organic chemistry.
The contents of course will focused on the structure and determination, organic reaction, delocalization and conjugation, acidity and basicity of organic material. 
This course will provide students of material and mineral resources fields with fundamental concept of organic material.
schedule:
week 1：Course Introduction
week 2：structure
week 3：Determining organic structure
week 4：Determining organic structure
week 5：Structure of molecules
week 6：Structure of molecules
week 7：Organic reactions
week 8：Organic reactions
week 9：midterm exam
week 10：Nucleophilic addition to the carbonyl group
week 11：Delocalization and conjugation
week 12：Acidity and basicity
week 13：Using organometallic reagents to make C-C bonds
week 14：Conjugate addition
week 15：Nucleophilic substitution at carbonyl group
week 16：Equilibria, rate and mechanisms
week 17：Other important reactions
week 18：final exam
materials: Organic Chemistry, Clayden, Greeves, Warren and Wothers, Oxford University Press.
